title: Can we please fucking get counterplay to vayne
body: there is none rn, even targeted CC is iffy since she has stealth and can just wait until the person with it is CC'd, give us an item to cut true dmg, or something, anything to deal with this cancer champ

replies.body: Nerf her W. It really needs a nerf.

> [{quoted}](name=BlackKnightJack,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AYiWJcAp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-08-19T23:11:58.115+0000)
>
> Nerf her W. It really needs a nerf.

I wouldnt even mind an item that literally only had the effect "vayne does 50% less true dmg to you"
